description:
These all-mountain boots underwrite your quest for touring fit and performance. The MTN Explore Ski Boots hike up like light touring boots and ski down like nimble downhill chargers. With 63 degrees of motion, they feel easy and natural on a long hike up. Thermoformable liners and shell tune the fit with precision, while the light weight encourages you to put the skins back on and go up for another lap.

  • Grilamid lower shell with a Polyolefin cuff
  • Custom Shell HD technology makes for a heat-mouldable shell to provide the best fit possible
  • Carbon fibre spine is rigid to allow a wide range of motion and forward flex
  • Motion Flex Technology offers 63 degrees of motion
  • 24mm riveted oversized pivot reduces play for precision and direct power transmission
  • Textile cover on lower tongue saves weight and adds comfort in walk mode
  • Ultralight thermoformable 3D liner with 2 pull loops is preshaped and has biovent ventilation
  • Surelock ski/walk mechanism has metal-on-metal locking system for reliable support
  • 2 buckles and a 35mm Velcro® booster strap
  • Contragrip sole provides grip and the rockered sole allows a natural walking motion
  • Low-tech inserts included
name: Salomon MTN Explore Ski Boots - Women's
